title: EOS Voice Integration Kit
description: The EOS Voice Integration Kit is a robust, easy-to-use plugin for Unreal Engine that enables seamless integration of the EOS Voice Chat system in multiplayer games.
longDescription:
EOS Voice Integration Kit is a comprehensive and feature-rich plugin designed specifically for Unreal Engine. It offers a seamless integration of the EOS Voice Chat system, enabling game developers to easily implement voice communication in their multiplayer games. This plugin provides a wide range of blueprint functions and features, allowing for effortless management of voice rooms, player muting, volume control, and input/output devices. By utilizing this plugin, game developers can create an immersive and interactive gaming experience for their players, fostering a sense of community and teamwork in online multiplayer environments.


This plugin can be used with EOS INTEGRATION KIT


THIS PLUGIN SUPPORTS POSITIONAL VOICE CHAT now



🔥Discord [Community and Exclusive Support]

❤️Setup and Preview

🙌 Lyra Integration [Coming Soon]

✌️Documentation
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Seamless EOS Voice Chat integration for Unreal Engine
  • Blueprint functions for initializing and connecting to EOS Voice Chat
  • User authentication with login and logout functionality
  • Voice room creation, management, and player joining/leaving
  • Player volume control and muting capabilities
  • Input/output device management for voice chat
  • Flexible voice transmission control (all rooms, selected rooms, or no rooms)
  • Comprehensive documentation and tutorials

Code Modules:

  •   EOSVoiceIntegrationKit [Runtime]

Number of Blueprints: 0

Number of C++ Classes: 6

Network Replicated: Not Required

Supported Development Platforms: Same as EOS Voice Chat Plugin

Supported Target Build Platforms: Same as EOS Voice Chat Plugin

Documentation: https://betide-studio.gitbook.io/eos-voice-integration-kit/

Example Project: Coming Soon

Important/Additional Notes:

  • This is based over EOS Voice Plugin but we will provide the support required and even to fulfil the needs of your personal projects
  • EOS Voice Integration Kit is Open-Sourced for the community and purchasing here gets you exclusive support and will help us make more open-source plugins.
